title: Vex X3M

controls: Speed Up: Press UP or WSlow Down or Go Back: Press DOWN or SLean Back: Press LEFT or ALean Forward: Press RIGHT or D
content.howToPlay: Start the game with the first level, and use WASD or arrow keys to ride your bike.Hit those checkpoint flags to save your spot. If you crash or get hit, you'll start from the last flag. Do flips in the air to cut down your time.Avoid Red Spikes. If you touch these, you're back to your last checkpoint.And fly over TNT Boxes. They blow up when you ride over them, so be quick!

fullContent: Homeâ€º DrivingVex X3MBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenWe're absolutely huge fans of the stickman adventures in Vex, where every level is a new challenge filled with precision platforming and clever puzzles. And who doesn't love the high-speed action of Moto X3M, where you ride through rough terrains on your bike? And let's not forget those flip stunts to cross the bridges.So, imagine the fun when these two classics come together under one roof! Vex X3M combines the iconic stickman style of Vex with the extreme bike ride of Moto X3M.It's a game where you tackle 30 daring levels, each packed with challenges like spikes, flying knives, rockets, laser beams and more! Our mission will be racing to the finish line, passing over checkpoint flags at full speed, and pulling off mind-blowing stunts. We'll claim our title as the ultimate VEX X3M Rider and have the bragging rights after! Let's begin!ControlsSpeed Up: Press UP or WSlow Down or Go Back: Press DOWN or SLean Back: Press LEFT or ALean Forward: Press RIGHT or DHow to Play Vex X3MStart the game with the first level, and use WASD or arrow keys to ride your bike.Hit those checkpoint flags to save your spot. If you crash or get hit, you'll start from the last flag. Do flips in the air to cut down your time.Avoid Red Spikes. If you touch these, you're back to your last checkpoint.And fly over TNT Boxes. They blow up when you ride over them, so be quick!Tiles to Watch OutOther than spikes and boxes, you need to watch out for the color of the tiles on the track.Black: Normal ground.Blue: Breaks when you ride over it.Purple: Disappears for a bit, then comes back.Brown: You can move these around.There are 30 levels, and they get tougher as you go. You'll need to be quick, smart, and a bit lucky to beat them all.And if you like to ride in style, you can unlock 16 different skins for your bike. How to unlock skins? Of course, with your coins earned on the levels. The more you play, the more coins you collect, letting you deck out your bike in style.Wrap-UpVEX X3M is not just riding; it's an adventure where you'll flip, jump, and dodge your way through some wild courses. Whether you're into stunts or just love a good challenge, VEX X3M is the ride for you. So, start your bike and let's hit the tracks!This article was updated on January 28, 20251 Player2DBikeCrashCrazyDrivingFreePhysicsSkillStuntTrial
